mug.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a tall cup used for drinking tea, coffee etc
mug.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a large glass with a handle, used especially for drinking beer
mug.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: someone who is stupid and easy to deceive
mug.translation[0].definitions[2].exampl: Only a mug would pay that much for a meal.
mug.translation[0].definitions[3].exampl: Something scared him. Probably your ugly mug!
mug.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to attack someone and rob them in a public place
mug.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: A lot of people won’t go out alone at night because they’re afraid of being mugged.
mug.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: to make silly expressions with your face or behave in a silly way, especially for a photograph or in a play
mug.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: All the kids were mugging for the camera.
